meanings.sent1: She walked chunkily across the room.
meanings.sent2: The soup was chunkily stirred before serving.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved chunkily, causing everyone to giggle.
meanings.sent4: The old printer churned out papers chunkily, like a tired old dog wagging its tail.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rain fell chunkily, creating puddles everywhere.

meanings.definition: Having a thick, solid appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The chunkily sweater kept her warm in the cold weather.
meanings.sent2: The stew was chunkily delicious with its hearty chunks of meat.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked chunkily inviting with its thick frosting.
meanings.sent4: The tree stump sat chunkily in the middle of the field, a reminder of the old oak.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf was chunkily built, able to hold many heavy books.
